input_args.passage: 'American | The greatest fiction books since 1950(1 to 50) determined by 130 lists and articles from various critics, authors and experts.'
input_args.claim: 'Comparing these two, Elie Wiesel seems to have a wider scope of profession, given that he held a professorship, taught a specific course, and also held the position of Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
